mapper.select:
Select a.ID, -- 상품_ID a.IMAGE_URL->>0 As IMAGE, -- 대표사진 a.CODE, -- 상품코드 a.NAME, -- 상품명 a.TYPE, -- 상품타입 a.CATEGORY_ID, -- 카테고리_ID a.PARTNER_ID, -- 파트너_ID a.PRICE, -- 정가 a.DISCOUNT_PRICE, -- 판매가 a.SALES_STATUS, -- 판매상태 a.STOCK, -- 재고 a.VISIBLE -- 활성화여부 FROM PRODUCTS a Where 1 = 1
And ( Upper(a.CODE) Like '%' || Upper(#{srchWord}) || '%' OR Upper(a.NAME) LiKE '%' || Upper(#{srchWord}) || '%' )
AND a.CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId}
AND a.SALES_STATUS = #{salesStatus}::sales_status
Order By a.CREATED_AT Desc

Select a.ID, -- 상품_ID a.NAME, -- 상품명 a.CODE, -- 상품코드 a.TYPE, -- 상품타입 a.CATEGORY_ID, -- 카테고리_ID a.PARTNER_ID, -- 파트너_ID a.PRICE, -- 정가 a.DISCOUNT_PRICE, -- 판매가 a.STOCK, -- 재고 a.SALES_STATUS, -- 판매상태 a.DESCRIPTION, -- 설명 a.SHIPPING_INFO, -- 배송정보 a.WARRANTY_INFO, -- 보증정보 a.RETURN_INFO, -- 반품/교환정보 a.DETAIL_CONTENT, -- 상세설명 a.USAGE_PERIOD, -- 사용기한 a.IMAGE_URL -- 이미지 FROM PRODUCTS a Where 1 = 1 And id = #{id}
Select a.ID, -- 섹션_ID a.NAME, -- 섹션명 a.DESCRIPTION, -- 설명 COALESCE(b.VISIBLE, false) VISIBLE -- 노출여부 From SECTION a Left Join PRODUCT_SECTION b On a.ID = b.SECTION_ID And b.PRODUCT_ID = #{id}
Select a.ID, -- 옵션_ID a.NAME, -- 옵션명 a.CODE, -- 옵션코드 a.PRICE_TYPE, -- 옵션별가격타입 a.REQUIRED -- 필수여부 FROM PRODUCT_OPTIONS a Where 1 = 1 And a.PRODUCT_ID = #{id}
Select a.ID, -- 옵션_ID a.NAME, -- 옵션명 a.CODE, -- 옵션코드 a.PRICE_TYPE, -- 옵션별가격타입 a.REQUIRED -- 필수여부 FROM PRODUCT_OPTIONS a Where 1 = 1 And a.ID = #{id}
Select a.ID, -- 옵션별가격_ID a.CODE, -- 코드 a.VALUE, -- 옵션별가격명 a.ADDITIONAL_PRICE -- 추가가격 FROM PRODUCT_OPTION_VALUES a Where 1 = 1 And a.OPTION_ID = #{id}

WITH period_base AS ( SELECT o.id AS option_id, o.name AS option_name, ov.id AS option_value_id, ov.value AS option_value_name, sd.group_no, MIN(sd.price_date) AS start_date, MAX(sd.price_date) AS end_date, sd.price, sd.discount_price FROM stay_date_prices sd JOIN product_option_values ov ON ov.id = sd.option_value_id JOIN product_options o ON o.id = ov.option_id WHERE 1 = 1 And o.product_id = #{id} GROUP BY o.id, o.name, ov.id, ov.value, sd.group_no, sd.price, sd.discount_price ) SELECT option_id, option_name, option_value_id, option_value_name, json_agg( json_build_object( 'groupNo', group_no, 'startDate', start_date, 'endDate', end_date, 'price', price, 'discountPrice', discount_price ) ORDER BY start_date ) AS periods FROM period_base GROUP BY option_id, option_name, option_value_id, option_value_name ORDER BY option_id, option_value_id;
mapper.insert: Insert Into PRODUCTS ( NAME, CODE, TYPE, CATEGORY_ID, PARTNER_ID, DESCRIPTION, IMAGE_URL, PRICE, DISCOUNT_PRICE, SALES_STATUS, STOCK, SALES_START_DATE, SALES_END_DATE, DISPLAY_ORDER, VISIBLE ) Values ( #{name}, 'PRD' || nextval('product_code_seq'), #{type}::product_type, #{categoryId}, #{partnerId}, #{description}, #{imageUrl, jdbcType=OTHER, typeHandler=kr.co.winnticket.common.typehandler.JsonListTypeHandler}, #{price}, #{discountPrice}, #{salesStatus}::sales_status, #{stock}, #{salesStartDate}, #{salesEndDate}, COALESCE((SELECT MAX(display_order) + 1 FROM PRODUCTS), 1), #{visible} )
mapper.update:
Update PRODUCTS
NAME = #{model.name},
CATEGORY_ID = #{model.categoryId},
PARTNER_ID = #{model.partnerId},
PRICE = #{model.price},
DISCOUNT_PRICE = #{model.discountPrice},
STOCK = #{model.stock},
SALES_STATUS = #{model.salesStatus}::sales_status,
DESCRIPTION = #{model.description},
IMAGE_URL = #{model.imageUrl, jdbcType=OTHER, typeHandler=kr.co.winnticket.common.typehandler.JsonListTypeHandler},
UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
Where 1 = 1 And ID = #{id}

Update PRODUCTS
SHIPPING_INFO = #{model.shippingInfo},
WARRANTY_INFO = #{model.warrantyInfo},
RETURN_INFO = #{model.returnInfo},
USAGE_PERIOD = #{model.usagePeriod},
UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
Where 1 = 1 And ID = #{id}

choose.when: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_SECTION ( PRODUCT_ID, SECTION_ID, VISIBLE ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{sectionId}, TRUE ) ON CONFLICT (PRODUCT_ID, SECTION_ID) DO UPDATE SET visible = TRUE, updated_at = NOW();

mapper.update:
Update PRODUCTS
DETAIL_CONTENT = #{detailContent},
UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
Where 1 = 1 And ID = #{id}

Update PRODUCTS
VISIBLE = #{visible},
UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
Where 1 = 1 And ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: Insert Into PRODUCT_OPTIONS ( PRODUCT_ID, NAME, CODE, PRICE_TYPE, REQUIRED ) Values ( #{id}, #{model.name}, #{model.code}, #{model.priceType}::option_price_type, #{model.required} )
mapper.update:
Update PRODUCT_OPTIONS
NAME = #{model.name},
CODE = #{model.code},
REQUIRED = #{model.required},
PRICE_TYPE = #{model.priceType}::option_price_type,
UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
Where 1 = 1 And ID = #{optionId}
mapper.insert: Insert Into PRODUCT_OPTION_VALUES ( OPTION_ID, VALUE, CODE, ADDITIONAL_PRICE ) Values ( #{optionId}, #{model.value}, #{model.code}, #{model.additionalPrice} )

INSERT INTO stay_date_prices ( option_value_id, price_date, price, discount_price, group_no ) SELECT #{optionValueId}, d::date, #{price}, #{discountPrice}, #{groupNo} FROM generate_series( #{startDate}::date, #{endDate}::date, interval '1 day' ) AS d
mapper.select: Select a.ID, -- 섹션_ID a.CODE, -- 코드 a.NAME, -- 이름 a.DISPLAY_ORDER, -- 표시순서 a.IS_ACTIVE, -- 활성화여부 a.IS_SYSTEM, -- 시스템등록여부 a.DESCRIPTION -- 설명 FROM SECTION a Where 1 = 1 Order By a.DISPLAY_ORDER ASC

Select a.ID, -- 섹션_ID a.CODE, -- 코드 a.NAME, -- 이름 a.DISPLAY_ORDER, -- 표시순서 a.IS_ACTIVE, -- 활성화여부 a.IS_SYSTEM, -- 시스템등록여부 a.DESCRIPTION -- 설명 FROM SECTION a Where 1 = 1 And IS_ACTIVE = true Order By a.DISPLAY_ORDER ASC
Select a.ID, -- 섹션_ID a.CODE, -- 코드 a.NAME, -- 이름 a.DISPLAY_ORDER, -- 표시순서 a.IS_ACTIVE, -- 활성화여부 a.IS_SYSTEM, -- 시스템등록여부 a.DESCRIPTION -- 설명 FROM SECTION a Where 1 = 1 And a.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: Insert Into SECTION ( CODE, NAME, DISPLAY_ORDER, DESCRIPTION, IS_ACTIVE, IS_SYSTEM ) Values ( #{code}, #{name}, #{displayOrder}, #{description}, #{isActive}, false )
mapper.update:
Update SECTION
CODE = #{model.code},
NAME = #{model.name},
DISPLAY_ORDER = #{model.displayOrder},
DESCRIPTION = #{model.description},
IS_ACTIVE = #{model.isActive},
UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
Where 1 = 1 And ID = #{id}
With reordered As ( Select id, Row_Number() Over (Order By DISPLAY_ORDER) NEW_ORDER From SECTION ) Update SECTION a Set DISPLAY_ORDER = x.NEW_ORDER From reordered x Where 1 = 1 And a.id = x.id
